title: make doc is broken
body:
## Bug Report

### What version of TiKV are you using?

master

### Steps to reproduce

`make doc`

### What did happened?

```
$ make doc
thread 'main' panicked at 'activated_features for invalid package: features did not find PackageId { name: "synstructure", version: "0.12.3", source: "registry `https://github.com/rust-lang/crates.io-index`" } false', src/tools/cargo/src/cargo/core/resolver/features.rs:227:14
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace
make: *** [Makefile:277: doc] Error 101
```

comments_data.body: with #9858 I think this should be reopened.
